mapper.select: SELECT ID , SUBJECT , CONTENT , BOARD.USER_ID , TO_CHAR(BOARD.CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRT_DT , TO_CHAR(BOARD.MDFY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') MDFY_DT , HIT , RECOMMEND , USERS.USER_NAME , BOARD.FILE_NAME FROM SYSTEM.BOARD , SYSTEM.USERS WHERE BOARD.USER_ID = USERS.USER_ID AND ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYSTEM.BOARD ( ID , SUBJECT , CONTENT , USER_ID , FILE_NAME , CRT_DT , MDFY_DT , HIT , RECOMMEND) VALUES ( BOARD_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{subject} , #{content} , #{userId} , #{fileName} , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , 0 , 0 )
